text.paragraph: It is the responsibility of the patient or patient representative to confirm the list of medications with either the patient's personal care provider or the patient's follow-up care provider to ensure the patient has an appropriate list of medications to take at home.
Preliminary list - medication reconciliation not completed.

item.content:
ibuprofen 200 mg Capsule, Ordered By: Thomas Anderson
Directions: 2 capsule oral twice a day after meals

aliskiren-amlodipine (Tekamlo) 150 mg-10 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Thomas Anderson
Directions: 1 tablet jejunostomy three times a day
Additional Instructions: Patient is higher fewer

list.item: SNOMED Smoking Status : Current Some Day Smoker

Notify Physician For : Fever or chills; Nausea and/or vomiting greater than 3 time or for longer than 24 hours, not relieved with anti-nausea medication; Diarrhea in large quantity or more than 3-4 bowel movements in 24 hours; Constipation, no bowel movement in 3 days or longer; Shortness of breath; Chest pain; Redness, swelling, warmth, pain at IV access site; Redness, swelling, warmth around incision, bleeding or drainage from incision; Severe weakness or tiredness; Severe pain that pain medication does not control
Activity : Bed Rest,OOB to Chair,Up ad lib
